name: Caterpie

attacks.name: String Shot
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pok√©mon is now Paralyzed.

flavorText: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls. LV. 13 #10

strengths: Only requires 1 Grass energy to attack, making it fast to deploy
String Shot can paralyze opponents on a successful coin flip
Low retreat cost of 1 provides mobility
40 HP is reasonable for a Basic Pokemon
Paralysis can buy time to evolve or set up your bench
weaknesses: Only deals 10 damage, which is quite low
Metapod evolution doesn't provide much improvement in competitive play
synergies: PlusPower can boost String Shot damage to 20
Switch allows you to retreat without paying retreat cost after paralyzing opponent
Defender reduces incoming damage while you set up paralysis locks
Scoop Up can reset Caterpie if it takes too much damage
counters: Full Heal or Switch to remove paralysis
High HP Pokemon that can survive paralysis lock
